00024 // TODO: 
00025 // NetBSD: u_short f_oflags - deprecated copy of mount flags
00026 // NetBSD: u_short f_flags - mount flags
00027 // OpenBSD: union mount_info mount_info - per fs mount options
00028 // FreeBSD: int32_t f_flags - mount flags
00029 // SCO OSR5: unsigned long f_flag - mount flags
00030 // solaris: u_long f_flag - mount flags
